summary: FRONT PASSENGER SIDE SEAT BACK COLLAPSES RANDOMLY AND QUICKLY.  THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS AND COULD CAUSE SPINAL INJURIES IN THE CASE OF AND ACCIDENT.   THE PASSENGER COMPLAINED OF A SORE NECK.   I WENT TO THE SATURN DEALER AND THEY SAID THAT I WOULD HAVE TO PURCHASE A NEW SEAT EVEN THOUGH THEY KNOW THERE ARE DEFECTS IN THE 1993 SEATS.   *NLM
